page.title: 10School Sports Cont.
page.content:
or Goal Attack or Goal Defence. The Goal Keeper stops the ball and the Shooter tries to get goals in.
ROUNDERS In the game rounders there are four posts and there are people by them and the bowler throws the ball at the batsman. There are at least ten in the bats team. The batsman hits the ball and if the other team catches the ball you are out. You have to run round the post and stop on a post if the other team have got the ball. If you get round all the posts you have got a rounder.
FOOTBALL is usually played by boys so I do not know much about it but I know that you kick the ball into the other team's goal.
